author: Felicia Schwartzand Jos
title: U.S. Officials on ‘Tough Trip’ in Mexico, Trump Says - WSJ
text:
U.S. Officials on ‘Tough Trip’ in Mexico, Trump Says Mexico Angry Over New U.S. Immigration, Deportation Rules By José de Córdoba in Mexico City and Ted Mann in Washington Google+ Feb. 23, 2017 12:44 p.m. ET 
A U.S. diplomatic overture to Mexico faced a make-or-break day Thursday, with relations on the rocks and Mexico newly angered over tougher U.S. immigration and deportation policies. 
Secretary of State Rex Tillerson and Homeland Security Secretary John Kelly held a round of talks Thursday with top Mexican officials in advance of a planned meeting with Mexico’s President Enrique Peña Nieto.
